name: Covalent (Shiba Dog Studios)
description:
Take the role of a lead scientist, performing top of the line research in the field of experimental chemistry!

Bond molecules and electrons to discover new and intriguing elements at the border where science and magic meet...

This game was created in one week for the Wanna-Yam 2022 Game Jam - Theme: Combination

Credits:

Cuba Stanley - Programming, Music, SFX Design, Game Design, Animation

Thanks for checking the game out! Let me know how you find it :) As usual, I spent too long working on polish and visuals so whilst the game feels pretty cool it's not got a lot to toy with and thus it comes across as more of a proof of concept.

That said, it's still not the easiest to craft everything so hopefully you'll keep experimenting! (Just in case you get stuck, here's a little playthrough of the game to show you all the combinations)
